section.p:
The last time you were here, you had only a few minutes to grab some loot. Desperately, you search around for the magic chest that Oliphard the Wizardly wanted you to get for him. You find it - note the
on your Adventure Sheet - but the sea dragon returns almost straight away, and you are forced to climb out of the hole in the roof without getting anything more, save for a pouch of .

You crawl out on to the island in the middle of the lake and hitch a boat ride back to Cadmium. During the journey, you examine the magic chest, but it is guarded by great sorcery and is impossible to open.
